histogram.name: Kiosk.AppService.Launch.AppReadiness
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the readiness of the app while attempting to launch the Kiosk app via App Service.

histogram.name: Kiosk.AppService.WebApp.InstallResult
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the install result code from Kiosk apps installed as externally managed apps in a web Kiosk.

histogram.name: Kiosk.AppService.WebApp.IsPlaceholder
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records whether the web app installed in web app platform is a placeholder, which happens when the app metadata cannot be fetched due to external authentication or network error while launching web Kiosk.

histogram.name: Kiosk.ChromeApp.ExtensionUpdateDuration.{Result}
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the duration for checking updates of secondary apps and extensions for a Kiosk Chrome app while launching.

histogram.name: Kiosk.ChromeApp.ExtensionUpdateError
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the reason for failed secondary apps and extensions updates while a Kiosk Chrome app is launching.

histogram.name: Kiosk.ChromeApp.ExternalUpdateSuccess
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records whether Kiosk Chrome app update via external USB drive is successful.

histogram.name: Kiosk.ChromeApp.PrimaryAppInSessionUpdate
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records count of in-session updates of primary Kiosk Chrome app. A forced restart is scheduled in 24 hours.

histogram.name: Kiosk.ChromeApp.PrimaryAppInstallError
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records error for failed initial install of primary Chrome app in Kiosk.

histogram.name: Kiosk.ChromeApp.PrimaryAppUpdateResult
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the result for an update of primary Chrome app in Kiosk.

histogram.name: Kiosk.ChromeProcessCount
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the number of processes on the machine that are running from chrome during Kiosk session. Recorded once per hour.

histogram.name: Kiosk.DeprecatedArcKioskUsers
histogram.summary: Reports "hidden" when the login screen hides a ARC kiosk user. Reports "deleted" when the login screen attempts to delete an ARC kiosk user. Recorded on startup.

histogram.name: Kiosk.DiskUsagePercentage
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the percentage of disk space in use during Kiosk session. Recorded once per hour.

histogram.name: Kiosk.Extensions.InstallDuration
histogram.summary: Records the duration for Kiosk launcher to wait for forced extensions to install.

histogram.name: Kiosk.Extensions.InstallError.{InstallSource}
histogram.summary: Records the reason for a Kiosk forced {InstallSource} extension install error. (Chrome OS only)

histogram.name: Kiosk.Extensions.InstallTimedOut
histogram.summary: Records whether Kiosk launcher times out waiting for extensions to install. Only recorded if forced extensions starts installing while a Web Kiosk is launching.

histogram.name: Kiosk.Launch.CryptohomeFailure
histogram.summary: Tracks cryptohome failure during kiosk launch.

histogram.name: Kiosk.Launch.Error
histogram.summary: Tracks Chrome OS Kiosk launch errors. Recorded when a Kiosk app fails to launch and returns to the login screen.

histogram.name: Kiosk.LaunchDuration.{KioskType}
histogram.summary: Records the total duration it takes to launch a kiosk app.

histogram.name: Kiosk.LaunchType
histogram.summary: Records kiosk launches, whether it is an enterprise or consumer kiosk and whether it is an auto launch or manual launch.

histogram.name: Kiosk.NewBrowserWindow
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records a new browser window type once a new browser window is attempted to be shown in a kiosk session. Distinguishes settings page, closed regular browser, opened regular browser, troubleshooting tools and system web app.

histogram.name: Kiosk.RamUsagePercentage
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the percentage of RAM in use during Kiosk session. Is recorded once per hour.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SecondaryApps.InstallSuccessful
histogram.summary: Records whether secondary apps are installed successfully in a Chrome App Kiosk. Only recorded once per Kiosk session which has secondary apps.

histogram.name: Kiosk.Session.CountPerDay
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Count of Kiosk sessions in the last 24h. Logged each time a kiosk session is started.

histogram.name: Kiosk.Session.LowDiskHighestSeverity
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the highest severity of low disk notification of a kiosk session. Logged on every kiosk session start, even if there was no notification during the last session.

histogram.name: Kiosk.Session.LowDiskSeverity
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records low disk notifications being issued. Logged once a low disk notification is supposed to be shown.

histogram.name: Kiosk.Session.NetworkDrops
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Number of network drops during a kiosk session. Logged on the next kiosk session start.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SessionDuration.Crashed
histogram.summary:
ChromeOS only. Duration of a kiosk session that ended with a crash. Metrics in this histogram are capped to 1 day (24 hours) to measure the number of long sessions compared to short ones. See also Kiosk.SessionDurationInDays.Crashed.
Note: Duration may be longer than actual session duration, because some crashes can be detected only on the next session start up. In those cases a duration effectively is a time between crashed session start and the following kiosk session start.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SessionDuration.Normal
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Duration of a kiosk session that ended successfully. Metrics in this histogram are capped to 1 day (24 hours) to measure the number of long sessions compared to short ones. See also Kiosk.SessionDurationInDays.Normal.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SessionDurationInDays.Crashed
histogram.summary:
ChromeOS only. Duration in days of a kiosk session that ended with a crash. This metric only tracks kiosk sessions that last longer than 1 day.
Note: Duration may be longer than actual session duration, because some crashes can be detected only on the next session start up. In those cases a duration effectively is a time between crashed session start and the following kiosk session start.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SessionDurationInDays.Normal
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Duration in days of a kiosk session that ended successfully. This metric only tracks kiosk sessions that last longer than 1 day.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SessionRestart.InternetAccess
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the Internet access info of the previous kiosk session during the session restart. The Internet access info is saved to the local state every hour. The Internet access info contains information whether device is offline and kiosk session supports offline mode.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SessionRestart.Reason
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the reason of a kiosk session restart. This metric is recorded when a new kiosk session started. It is based on the previous kiosk session end reason.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SessionRestart.UserActivity
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the last saved user activity of the previous kiosk session. The user activity is saved to the local state every hour. It contains information whether the user was actively using the device or the device was idle during the last check-in.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SessionState
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records kiosk session states, whether it is started, closed, crashed, etc. Emitted when the kiosk session state changes. Crashed kiosk sessions can be detected on the following kiosk start.

histogram.name: Kiosk.SwapUsagePercentage
histogram.summary: ChromeOS only. Records the percentage of swap memory in use during Kiosk session. Recorded once per hour.

histogram.name: Kiosk.WebApp.InstallError
histogram.summary: Records the reason for Web App install error in a Web Kiosk.
